pages.text: Roughly Enough Items (REI) is a block, item, and recipe viewing mod. This is a very basic and older video but what he shows is still relevant: $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ferGeOe12I)$(br)REI Showcase$(/l)$(br2)$(l)Advanced Search$()$(br)$(li)Mod: @[modname] Non-case sensitive, searching via mod, for example @materialisation to search for items added by materialisation.

$(li)Tooltip: #[text] Non-case sensitive, searching via tooltip, for example #protection to search for protection books.$(li)Tags: tag Non-case sensitive, searching via tags, for example $logs to search for logs.$(li)Regex: r/regex/ Case sensitive, searching via regex, for example r/(Golden )?Apple) to search for golden apples or apples.$(li)Quotes: Allowing spaces, for example "#protection iii" to search with spaces. Or: | Or, for example apple|$logs to search for apples or logs.

$(l)Options$()$(li)Hover over Gear icon by "Search..." to see several options - Click on it to see more$()$(li)Crafting Table icon toggles "Showing All" and "Showing Craftable" - hovering shows different search bar location options.$(br2)For more information visit $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/roughly-enough-items) CurseForge.com$(/l)
